articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Google brings Gemini to Wear OS watches, adds AI Mode to Circle to Search - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google is rolling out Gemini to Wear OS watches. The announcement is part of Google’s plans to replace Google Assistant with Gemini across all of its devices and platforms.
articles.content: Google announced on Wednesday that it’s rolling out Gemini to Wear OS watches, nearly two months after teasing the move back in May. The tech giant is also adding new Circle to Search capabilities by… [+2713 chars]
